title: Driving The 2023 BMW 7 Series - Exceptional Luxury And Creeping Featuritis

title: Bill To Make Daylight Saving Time Permanent Now Stalled In Congress, Here’s Why

title: From “Who Cares Wins” To Pernicious Progressivism: 18 Years Of ESG
description: The 2004 report "Who Cares Wins" introduced the acronym ESG. It was endorsed by 20 financial institutions. Their focus was ESG for value creation. Fast forward 18 years. The list of Republicans who assert that  ESG is a pernicious progressive strategy to undermine America continues to grow.

title: Third Quarter Storage & Memory Demand Drops Significantly, Sign Of Ongoing Correction?
description: HDDs capacity and unit shipments were down about 37% and about 14% respectively in C3Q 2022, Q2Q.  Memory, was down 27% in capacity shipments over the same period.  Several factors are responsible for the drop in storage demand, including slower demand for storage at the major data centers.

title: The Climate Crisis Is A Miracle
description:
The climate crisis is caused by our species moving out of poverty. It’s the result of decreased starvation, death, violence and suffering. 

It will be exacerbated AND can only be resolved by the acceleration of this trend.

title: COP 27: How the UN’s Global Climate Conference First Started
description:
Why is the global community descending on Sharm El-Sheikh, Egypt? What is a COP? How did this global conference on climate change come to be?

This series of articles will give you all the answers to understanding climate negotiations. This first piece will explore where it all began: Rio, 1992.
